title: Bringhurst for the Web (sort of)
content: Recently found this via [@ESpiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20120710223300/http:/twitter.com/espiekermann) and thought everyone here might find it interesting, if not useful: [http://webtypography.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120710223300/http:/webtypography.net/ "http://webtypography.net/")
author: penn

comments.content:
From 2005 - [http://www.typophile.com/node/16696](http://web.archive.org/web/20120710223300/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16696 "http://www.typophile.com/node/16696")  
and again in 2006 - [http://typophile.com/node/29622](http://web.archive.org/web/20120710223300/http:/typophile.com/node/29622 "http://typophile.com/node/29622")

Cheers, Si

Nice, thanks. Did a quick search for past threads and didn't come up with anything. Probably should have known better / dug a little deeper.

Moderators can feel free to delete this thread.
